ThermoPhysicalModels
{
    surnum = "热物理模型设置"
    model_all = 0
    NavierStokes
    {
        surnum = "N-S方程参数"
        velocity_pressure_algo = "simplec"
        density_relaxation = 0.8
        pressure_relaxation = 0.3
    }
    Turbulence
    {
        surnum = "湍流模型设置"
        model = "k-epsilon"
        momentum_source_term = 1
        k_clipping_value = 8000.0
        KEpsilon
        {
            surnum = "K-Epsilon参数库"
            ce1 = 1.44
            ce2 = 1.92
            ce4 = 1.2
            sigmak = 1.0
            sigmae = 1.3
            source_coupling = 1
            rotation_correction_type_hid = "cazalbou"

        WallFunction
        {
            surnum = "壁面函数"
            name = "two_scale_log_wall_function"
            karman_constant = 0.42
            yplus_limit = 10.88
        }

    {
        surnum = "传热模型设置"
        model = "off"
    }

        surnum = "燃烧模型设置"
        model = "off"

            num_properties = 0
        }

            num_variables = 0
        }

        surnum = "辐射模型设置"
        model = "off"

    }

    {
        surnum = "离散相模型设置"

            surnum = "JavisPartOutput"

BoundaryCondition
{
    surnum = "边界条件"
    num_boundary_zone = 3
    boundary_zone_1
    {
        surnum = "边界_1"
        name = "inlet"
        nature = "inlet"
        location = 3
        NavierStokes
        {
            surnum = "动量"
            choice = "velocity_norm"
            value = 0.9
            direction = "normal"
            headloss = 0
            is_convective_inlet = 0
        }
        Turbulence
        {
            surnum = "湍流"
            choice = "turbulent_intensity"
            hydraulic_diameter = 0.0255
            turbulent_intensity = 5.0
        }
        Particles
        {
            surnum = "粒子"
            choice = "inlet"
            class_nums = 1
            inject_rotate_copy_switch = 0
            class_1
            {
                surnum = "种类_1"
                number = 1
                frequency = 0
                density = 780.0
                nozzle_status = 0
                temperature_status = 1
                one_point_inject_status = 1
                Diameter
                {
                    surnum = "Diameter"
                    choice = "prescribed"
                    value = 0.0005
                    standard_deviation = 0.0
                }
                Velocity
                {
                    surnum = "Velocity"
                    choice = "components"
                    value = [0.0, 0.0, 10.0]
                }
                OnePointInjectType
                {
                    surnum = "粒子单点注入设置"
                    inject_type = 2
                    inject_point = [0.0, 0.036, 0.0]
                    inject_internal_tol = 1.0e-05
                }
                StatisticalWeight
                {
                    surnum = "粒子表征权重设置"
                    choice = "rate"
                    mass_flow_rate = 0.001
                }
                Temperature
                {
                    surnum = "粒子热力参数设置"
                    choice = "prescribed"
                    value = 300.0
                    specific_heat = 1400.0
                    emissivity = 0.7
                }
            }
        }
    }
    boundary_zone_2
    {
        surnum = "边界_2"
        name = "outlet"
        nature = "outlet"
        location = 4
        Particles
        {
            surnum = "粒子"
            choice = "outlet"
        }
    }
    boundary_zone_3
    {
        surnum = "边界_3"
        name = "wall"
        nature = "wall"
        roughness = 0.0
        location = 5
        NavierStokes
        {
            surnum = "动量"
            is_sliding_wall = 0
            is_rotating_wall = 0
        }
        Particles
        {
            surnum = "粒子"
            choice = "bounce"
            norm_factor = 1.0
            tang_factor = 1.0
        }
    }

NumericalParameters
{
    surnum = "数值参数设置"
    gradient_reconstruction = "Least Squares Method"
    time_stepping_scheme = "implicit euler"
    EquationParameters
    {
        surnum = "方程求解设置"
        pressure
        {
            surnum = "压力方程"
            label = "Pressure"
            residual_tol = 0.0001
        }
        velocity
        {
            surnum = "动量方程"
            label = "Velocity"
            residual_tol = 0.0001
            convection_scheme = "nvd_tvd_scheme"
            Advanced
            {
                surnum = "Advanced"
                ConvectionScheme
                {
                    surnum = "对流项重构"
                    limiter_choice = "VANLEERV"
                }
            }
        }
        k
        {
            surnum = "k方程"
            label = "k"
            residual_tol = 0.0001
            convection_scheme = "second_order_linear_upwind"
        }
        epsilon
        {
            surnum = "epsilon方程"
            label = "epsilon"
            residual_tol = 0.0001
            convection_scheme = "second_order_linear_upwind"
        }
    }
}
